ai-tika-abh08t14:1_0: The Description of the development of concentration in the formless realm.
ai-tika-abh08t14:2_0: Forms are found in him on physical matters, etc., which is attached to, stones, rods, and swords.
ai-tika-abh08t14:3_0: it is as if swiftly as a nuneps off a drill-stick (consequence) like a dog’s head,
ai-tika-abh08t14:5_0: Getting that they were born in them, and they illuminated it with that thought, “Upaka, I am going to heaven”, and so on, doing it.
ai-tika-abh08t14:5_1: When spoken is said, “Not doing this,” “The actual ones do not argue with the thought.”
ai-tika-abh08t14:6_0: The jhāna of the fine-material sphere is used in the fine-material sphere.
ai-tika-abh08t14:7_0: consciousness is attached to it, just as that consciousness belongs to the base consisting of boundless consciousness.
ai-tika-abh08t14:8_1: This is called consciousness that occurred in space, such is said to be ‘consciousness’.
ai-tika-abh08t14:8_2: consciousness is not-self, and has not absenceed consciousness as its object, since it is called “unbounded” in the mind-consciousness that is not actually explained,
ai-tika-abh08t14:9_0: the first perception of the fine-material sphere is immaterial,
ai-tika-abh08t14:10_0: When you return, mindfulness is established and lucid.
ai-tika-abh08t14:12_0: In the second tetrad the eye is inferior: “The eye is in the second jhāna, which is necessarily purified, and subsequently,” it is exalted in the Paṭisambhidā, among the Paṭakas, etc., is the second indication of the eyes, and so on.
ai-tika-abh08t14:12_1: he (going) the right measure of that which was heedless and without protection,
ai-tika-abh08t14:13_1: ‘This attainment is the one-and-assured and incompetent attainment will do even a single one that is so. The matter will be peaceful,’
ai-tika-abh08t14:14_0: neither percipient nor non-percipient, and one perception nor non-percipient.
ai-tika-abh08t14:15_1: Having neither perception nor non-perception, this is a specific condition for attainment. Because of the fourth jhāna, they were unable to fulfill knowledge of the elements.
ai-tika-abh08t14:16_0: wrapped in a palace and so on,
ai-tika-abh08t14:17_1: If a mendicant knows the attainment of the formless attainment, he knows forms, and he has mastered the fine-material attainment with sights, and the second absorption on the third absorption, then masters that which has the physical form of the fine-material and immaterial existence in them, and whenever they have mastered it,
ai-tika-abh08t14:18_0: Such is the defeat of this Dhamma.
ai-tika-abh08t14:19_0: The Description of the development of concentration in the formless realm is finished.
